title: Tahm player won't let me leave base
body:
Thanks Riot

I mean really

You want people to hate your game? Like really hate it?

Queue as jungle. Tahm holds my first camp hostage. Can't get it. Takes it out of range and his duo queue buddy ADC steals it. W/e

Keeps doing it to other jungle camps.

Starts taking out mid laner and shooting him into the enemy team

Now he's sitting in our base and eating me, taking me back to fountain and that's it. I can't leave the fucking base.

Fucking dumbasses that designed this shit
